html:
2026-0031
2026-01-26IRCCImmigration and Refugee Protection ActReappointment of a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office) and her designation as Assistant Deputy Chairperson of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office)Reappointment of Annie Lafleur of Montréal, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective April 30, 2026; and her designation as Assistant Deputy Chairperson of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office).N/A
subject: Reappointment of a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office) and her designation as Assistant Deputy Chairperson of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office)
precis: Reappointment of Annie Lafleur of Montréal, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective April 30, 2026; and her designation as Assistant Deputy Chairperson of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office).
